long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Focus allows you to create focus sessions of 20min by blocking access to all other sites not whitelisted. You can whitelist the domain such as the website you are developing and testing at the moment and other sites are blocked during the focused session. You can end focus session or it will be ended after 20min is over.

This way you will be more productive and can achieve more.
